mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1135) for an order placed by Rex Rinehart for 200 two color jumbos for a performance by Web Pierce, George Morgan, and Duke of Paducah at the Oxnard High School Gym in Oxnard, California on March 27. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
